Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With Dr. Mike Murdock.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman is accused of forcing his attentions on a local woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas faces lynching for unwittingly buying stolen horses.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An amiable handyman in town has dreams of becoming a famous gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark set out on a hunting trip and stumble upon a robbery.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: The Cannons recall when lawman John had to arrest Buck for bank robbery and murder; guest Gary Busey.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: A war engulfs the Cannons when they help a wounded Apache leader wanted for murder.

programme.title: Edge of Eternity
programme.desc: Widowed Les Martin (Cornel Wilde) is an ex-detective haunted by a case he left behind in Denver. Now, Martin is the deputy sheriff of a small Arizona town with nothing to do but pull over beautiful local socialite Janice Kendon (Victoria Shaw) for occasional speeding -- until a mysterious murder at a nearby ghost town requires him to put his old skills to use once again. With the help of Sheriff Edwards (Edgar Buchanan) and Kendon, Martin must unravel a murderous plot involving stolen gold.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: At a sprawling Texas ranch, a mysterious young man nicknamed Cooncat (John Barrymore Jr.) tells rancher Horse Davis (Basil Ruysdael) an improbable story about a murder at a nearby trading post. His descriptions of the men he believes committed the crime, Smiling Man (Jack Elam) and Roper (Dave Kashner), fit those of two members of a rival family who were killed during a land fight years earlier. Another shooting draws Horse's future son-in-law, Pat Farrell (John Archer), into the mystery.

programme.title: Two Rode Together
programme.desc: For a fee, hard-drinking Texas marshal Guthrie McCabe (James Stewart) agrees to help Army officer Jim Gary (Richard Widmark) search for a group of whites who were abducted years earlier by Comanche warriors. After rescuing two of the abductees, McCabe and Gary find that the former captives have fully adopted the culture of their American Indian captors and are barely recognizable. Cultures collide as they attempt to return the settlers to their original -- and now long-forgotten -- lives.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: After a man is shot in Dodge, Matt learns that the bullet was actually meant for him.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A saloon girls is courted by two men, who each threaten the other with violence.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A landowner plans to evict a family from his land during a cholera outbreak.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt and Chester find a crippled man near death on the prairie and rescue him.

programme.title: Gunsmoke: One Man's Justice
programme.desc: Former Marshal Matt Dillon (James Arness) and a traveling salesman (Bruce Boxleitner) help a teen (Kelly Morgan) track his mother's killers to Mexico.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: A stranger (James Garner) tames an Old West boomtown and woos the mayor's daughter (Joan Hackett) on his way to Australia.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: One of the riders is killed by a stray bullet during a shootout and another seeks revenge for his friend's killing.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: A man kills a Wells Fargo agent while stealing gold bullion.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: An outlaw's wife offers Hardie a share of the loot to protect her from blackmailers.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: An heiress to the town of Wolf Creek faces threats if she claims her inheritance.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: The heir to a fortune becomes wanted for murder.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With Dr. Mike Murdock.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With James Payne.

programme.title: Mike Murdock - School of Wisdom
programme.desc: Biblical principles of wisdom that help individuals face life's successes.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Dr. David Jeremiah shares the practical messages behind Christianity and helps people to discover their own turning points in their relationship with God.

programme.title: Forgotten Jews
programme.desc: Join the International Fellowship of Christians and Jews to ease the suffering of elderly Jews in war-torn Ukraine and provide a survival food box; save Holocaust survivors who can't afford both food and medicine.

programme.title: Who Has Access to Your Personal Data?
programme.desc: Even if YOU do everything right to protect yourself, company and institutional data breaches are out of your control. Nearly 1 out of 4 US consumers have been a victim of identity theft. Find out how LifeLock can help protect your identity.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: Mingo masquerades as a British major (Harold Gould) to steal a shipment of rapid-firing rifles.

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: A vengeful ex-convict (Lee Marvin) kidnaps Garth, intending to use torture to reduce him to savagery; guests Albert Salmi, Ron Soble.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt engages in hand-to-hand combat with a gunman who recently killed.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester swears that the stranger in town is there to kill him, but Matt is skeptical.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: During a heavy snowstorm Matt seeks shelter in a prairie cabin and encounters two bank robbers.

programme.title: Gunsmoke: The Last Apache

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Avenger Hoss and Joe desperately look for a way to prevent brothers Adam and Ben from being hanged for a crime. A stranger, Lassiter, comes to town in an attempt to find the truth and prove Adam and Ben's innocence.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Savage On his way to Nevada, Adam rides up on some Indians wanting to harm a white woman they believe is a mountain spirit. They escape but Adam is wounded. The woman nurses him back to health but the tribe is on their trail.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E12 Silent Thunder Angry at the way a young deaf woman is treated by her father, Little Joe decides to teach her sign language so they can communicate better. However, his plan backfires when she falls in love with him.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Safe Guard A new bank opens in North Fork, and banker John Hamilton hires Floyd Doniger for security. However, problems arise when robbers who followed the new safe into town discover their old pal Floyd is the bank guard.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace

programme.desc: S1 E8 The Safe Guard A new bank opens in North Fork, and banker John Hamilton hires Floyd Doniger for security. However, problems arise when robbers who followed the new safe into town discover their old pal Floyd is the bank guard.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E8 End of Innocence Jimmy accompanies Emma to Fort Reunion to help a friend give birth. While there, they encounter the wicked commanding officer responsible for an Indian massacre at a peaceful village. Jimmy tries to find out the truth of what really happened.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Based on a Willie Nelson song, a spirited preacher and his wife come from the East to Montana to serve a country church. However, when overwhelming problems develop, the preacher must take revenge and attempt to save a town from a gang of cruel men.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 Day of the Hunter A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it's an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody's brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other's workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba's ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E16 The Sidewinder Gridley Maule comes to North Fork with revenge on his mind and confronts Lucas, who shot and killed his father years ago during a bank robbery. When Gridley tries to get Mark to fight, Micah puts him in jail, and Lou steps in to reform the young boy.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Mill Tom Edwards is in a wheelchair and holds Ben Cartwright responsible for his condition. When Tom turns to drinking to ease his pain, the Cartwrights work together to help him find purpose in his life again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E10 Season Round Up This special edition of The Cowboy Way: Alabama revisits the action from Season One as cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger build their cattle business. Of course the guys have their hands full wrangling cattle and taming unruly horses, but their personal lives are just as action-packed. Newlyweds Bubba and Cody are getting used to being family men, while Booger struggles through a series of dates on a quest to find the love of his life. Chock-full of season highlights as well as hilarious never-before-seen outtakes, it's an entertaining look at the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger: Back in the Saddle Back for a new season of riding horses and roping cows, cowboy trio Bubba, Cody and Booger undertake a huge cattle drive for Cody's brother in-law in Mississippi. Bubba and Kaley wager a bet on who can better handle the other's workload: Bubba tries his hand at babysitting while Kaley does Bubba's ranch chores. Misty wants to be a stay-at-home mom, but suffers an accident while trying to help Cody on the farm. As Booger and his girlfriend Jaclyn get more serious, Booger considers taking their relationship one step further.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E16 The Sidewinder Gridley Maule comes to North Fork with revenge on his mind and confronts Lucas, who shot and killed his father years ago during a bank robbery. When Gridley tries to get Mark to fight, Micah puts him in jail, and Lou steps in to reform the young boy.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Mill Tom Edwards is in a wheelchair and holds Ben Cartwright responsible for his condition. When Tom turns to drinking to ease his pain, the Cartwrights work together to help him find purpose in his life again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he's called to Mississippi to visit Kaley's parents. Bubba's in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E3 Tradition vs. Technology A routine job turns tough when the cowboys struggle to wrangle the herd across a highway, sparking Cody's idea to use GPS devices so they can easily find cattle in the pasture. Bubba hides a cow in the woods and Booger challenges Cody to prove GPS technology beats traditional methods. Misty and Kaley help Jaclyn find the perfect wedding dress while Bubba fails to fit into his tuxedo pants, prompting Booger and Cody to put him on a weight-loss regimen. Cody writes a song in honor of Booger's wedding and surprises Misty with a trailer for her new cattle business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E17 The Sixteenth Cousin The big day finally arrives in North Fork as the first train comes to town. Onboard are Lucas and Mark along with a Japanese nobleman and his servant. When bullies harass the foreign visitors, the pair quickly teaches them a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E18 Hostages to Fortune On Halloween, Mark and his friends wear masks and go from ranch to ranch to play pranks. Knowing the boys will be blamed, rustlers wear similar masks to steal cattle. Lucas thinks the boys are mixed up in the theft, until he finds out the truth.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E14 Shadowmen A Pinkerton agent comes to Rock Creek in search of a bank robber. Meanwhile, Teaspoon befriends Marie, who claims to be destitute, but Bill and Jesse discover that she is part of an outlaw gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Hopefuls Jacob Darien is leading his family through Virginia City when they are accosted. Adam Cartwright and his new traveling companion, Sam Bord, step in to help. Adam offers to escort them, unaware that Sam is planning a robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he's called to Mississippi to visit Kaley's parents. Bubba's in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don't arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher's herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn't ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E19 And the Devil Makes Five While returning from a hunting trip, Lucas and Mark meet Marshal Micah Torrance who is escorting prisoner Scully Potter to trial. Later in camp, Lucas' life is suddenly in danger when a rattlesnake is found in his bedroll. Potter tries to escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Long Winter Cheyenne waits out a long winter with a herd in the northern mountains during a cattle drive. Trouble arises as he finds himself not only dealing with the conditions, but feuding trail hands, a mule, Christmas, and love.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E3 Death Deals the Hand Cheyenne teams up with old Hoot Hollister, who is planning to marry his girlfriend, on a riverboat trip to St. Louis. While aboard, things begin to unravel when they entangle with a teacher and crooked gamblers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E6 Denver McKee While celebrating the return of his daughter, Connie, former lawman McKee is asked to help capture an outlaw gang. While Joe is courting Connie, no one realizes that McKee is actually in with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don't arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: Arts In Motion
programme.desc: Cecilia Bartoli maps her extraordinary career. Moving from intimate rehearsals to world-renowned stages, Cecilia unveils the unrivalled devotion and interpretive brilliance that underlie her genius.

programme.title: Bell, Book and Candle
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, Gillian Holroyd (Kim Novak) is a modern-day witch living in New York City's Greenwich Village. When she encounters charming publisher Shepherd Henderson (James Stewart), she decides to make him hers by casting a love spell. Gillian takes added pleasure in doing so because Henderson is engaged to her old college rival (Janice Rule). However, Gillian finds herself actually falling for Shepherd, which poses a problem: She will lose her powers if she falls in love.

programme.title: Susan Slept Here
programme.desc: A penniless Hollywood scriptwriter agrees to look after a rebellious teenage girl at Christmas in order to help with his research for film about juvenile delinquency. The troublesome girl causes all kinds of problems, not the least of which is setting the writer's girlfriend on fire with jealousy.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: The March sisters -- Meg (Janet Leigh), Jo (June Allyson), Beth (Margaret O'Brien) and Amy (Elizabeth Taylor) -- struggle to make ends meet in their New England household while their father is away fighting in the Civil War. Despite harsh times, they cling to optimism, often with neighbor Laurie (Peter Lawford) as a companion. As they mature, they face burgeoning ambitions and relationships, as well as tragedy, all the while maintaining their unbreakable bond.

programme.title: The Blazing Trail
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine leads the Durango Kid and a newspaperman on a trail marked by suspicion and deceit.

programme.title: Bonanza Town
programme.desc: The Durango Kid learns that a supposedly dead outlaw is alive and well and in cahoots with a corrupt town boss.

programme.title: Tribute to a Bad Man
programme.desc: When hot-headed rancher Jeremy Rodock (James Cagney) is shot by rustlers stealing his horses, cowboy Steve Millar (Don Dubbins) saves his life by cleaning his bullet wound. A grateful Rodock offers him a job. Ranch hand McNulty (Stephen McNally), beaten and fired by Rodock for flirting with Rodock's wife (Irene Papas), joins forces with the rustlers to once again target his old boss. After another herd is stolen, Rodock tracks down the thieves to wreak a bloody revenge.

programme.title: Gun Glory
programme.desc: An ex-gunslinger (Stewart Granger) shunned by townsfolk is the only one who knows how to stop a ruthless cattleman.

programme.title: The World of Henry Orient
programme.desc: Two rich Manhattan schoolgirls (Tippy Walker, Merrie Spaeth) become infatuated with a pianist (Peter Sellers) and follow him around.

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: The recently divorced Gilbert discovers that his new girlfriend has stolen $50,000 and is carrying on with other men. Not long afterward, he disappears. Anxious to locate her father, Gilbert's daughter goes to private detective Nick Charles for help.

programme.title: Stand-In
programme.desc: New York bankers send a businessman (Leslie Howard) to Hollywood to shape up a wild studio.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: An unjustly imprisoned Frenchman (Robert Donat) escapes, finds treasure and seeks revenge with power.

programme.title: Arizona Days
programme.desc: A singing cowboy (Tex Ritter) saves his stranded medicine show by collecting back taxes for a commission.

programme.title: Both Barrels Blazing
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) shoots holes in a scheme to ship stolen gold.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp arrests a stagecoach robber who copies the style of Jesse James, but the witnesses refuse to testify and the robber goes free, leading Earp to enlist the skill of a cheating gambler to set a trap for him.

programme.desc: Your words hold incredible power; today, Joyce reveals how the things you say can impact your life in profound ways.

programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.desc: A former Confederate spy asks Earp and Bat to help her escape from her dead brother's gang; Bat develops feelings for the woman, but Earp, doubting her story, obeys a warrant calling for her arrest.

programme.desc: The wife (Angela Lansbury) of a roving marshal (Randolph Scott) wants him to quit, but first he has to clean up Medicine Bend.

programme.title: On Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: A teenage tomboy (Doris Day) with a fun family makes music with a college man (Gordon MacRae) in circa-World War I Indiana.

programme.title: By the Light of the Silvery Moon
programme.desc: A World War I veteran (Gordon MacRae) makes his Indiana sweetheart (Doris Day) wait for marriage while he makes money.

programme.title: Ma and Pa Kettle at Home
programme.desc: The Kettles try to make their dilapidated farm into an efficient, model operation as they compete for a scholarship.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: After graduating from West Point, Jeb Stuart and George Custer are both stationed at Fort Leavenworth in Kansas. Once there, they find that the violent abolitionist John Brown has laid waste to the state, killing anyone who gets in the way of his anti-slavery crusade. While the duo must work together to battle the murderous revolutionary, they also come to blows over their competing love for Kit Carson Holliday.

programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A young doctor asks Holmes to investigate the strange behavior of his benefactor.

programme.title: On Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: A teenage tomboy (Doris Day) with a fun family makes music with a college man (Gordon MacRae) in circa-World War I Indiana.

programme.title: By the Light of the Silvery Moon
programme.desc: A World War I veteran (Gordon MacRae) makes his Indiana sweetheart (Doris Day) wait for marriage while he makes money.

programme.title: Ma and Pa Kettle at Home
programme.desc: The Kettles try to make their dilapidated farm into an efficient, model operation as they compete for a scholarship.

programme.title: Fury at Gunsight Pass
programme.desc: One bank robber (David Brian) double-crosses another (Neville Brand), giving the undertaker and others a chance at the loot.

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer (Audie Murphy) falls in love with a part-Indian missionary (Linda Lawson) in Arizona.

programme.title: The Rounders
programme.desc: Ben Jones (Glenn Ford) and Howdy Lewis (Henry Fonda) are cowboys who spend their days breaking horses and flirting with two sisters (Kathleen Freeman, Joan Freeman). When Ben and Howdy trade Ol' Fooler, an unbreakable horse, for corn liquor, the client returns the horse after it passes out from drinking whiskey. The cowboys grow fond of Ol' Fooler and, knowing that he is nearly impossible to ride, enter the horse in the rodeo hoping to make their fortune.

programme.title: Come to the Stable
programme.desc: In this heartwarming 1949 film, Sister Margaret (Loretta Young) and Sister Scholastica (Celeste Holm) arrive unannounced and determined to build a children's hospital in the small New England town of Bethlehem. They seek to fulfill a promise they made to God when he saved a similar infirmary in war-torn Normandy. To build it, the sisters recruit various townspeople, negotiate with a bookie (Thomas Gomez) for the land and contend with a songwriter (Hugh Marlowe) who's set against the project.

programme.title: All That Heaven Allows
programme.desc: Predicated on a May-December romance. The difference here is that the woman, attractive widow Cary Scott (Jane Wyman), is considerably older than the man, handsome gardener-landscaper Ron Kirby (Rock Hudson). Throwing conventional behavior to the winds and facing social ostracism, Cary pursues her romance with Ron, who is unjustly perceived as a fortune-hunter by Cary's friends and family -- especially her priggish brother Ned (William Reynolds).

programme.title: The Trouble With Angels
programme.desc: Mary (Hayley Mills) and her friend, Rachel (June Harding), are new students at St. Francis Academy, a boarding school run by the iron fist of Mother Superior (Rosalind Russell). The immature teens grow bored and begin playing pranks on both the unsuspecting nuns and their unpleasant classmates, becoming a constant thorn in Mother Superior's side. However, as the years pass, Mary and Rachel slowly mature and begin to see the nuns in a different light.

programme.title: The 39 Steps
programme.desc: While on vacation in London, Canadian Richard Hannay (Robert Donat) becomes embroiled in an international spy ring related to the mysterious "39 steps." Then he meets agent Annabella Smith (Lucie Mannheim), who is soon killed in his apartment. He must elude the police, who are hunting him for murder, while he tries to stop Professor Jordan (Godfrey Tearle) from sending secrets out of the country. Hannay is assisted by Pamela (Madeleine Carroll), an unwilling accomplice who discovers the truth.

programme.title: The Floorwalker
programme.desc: A man (Charles Chaplin) interrupts a department-store robbery.

programme.title: Life Outreach Mission Feeding

programme.desc: Anchors Carl Quintanilla and Sara Eisen focus on what is moving the stock markets, the agenda for the business day, detailed data on individual stocks, sectors and the indices that investors and traders want.

programme.title: Halftime Report
programme.desc: The front lines of market coverage; host Scott Wapner and the top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Closing Bell

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Little Big Horn

John Haywood (John Ireland), who Donlin knows is having an affair with his wife, Celie (Marie Windsor).

programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: (2019) Greta Gerwig's Oscar-winning period drama adaptation of the classic Louisa May Alcott novel, starring Emma Watson, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, Timothée Chalamet and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: (2018) Nautical action thriller. Gerard Butler stars as an unconventional submarine skipper sent to investigate the torpedoing of a US vessel. With Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini and Common.

programme.title: Plane

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The annual Pontiacs in Pigeon Forge Show is bigger than ever at its new home at the LeConte Center.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: A special event held at the NHOU headquarters in Chichester, New Hampshire celebrates franchisees and dealers from across the U.S. and Canada.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: Classic Auto Rides puts on their annual car show in beautiful Buford, GA.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: Bringing out all kinds of classics, customs and muscle cars to fill the streets of downtown Greenville, Pa..

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: An annual charity car show in Cheyenne, Wyoming.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The Jeeps are invading again, and the teams is here for all the action in the Great Smoky Mountains in Pigeon Forge, Tenn.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: Sam travels to the Savoy Automobile Museum's annual Connection Car Show in Cartersville, GA.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Whether it's an impossible dream build or installing the latest in aftermarket parts, Gearz host Stacey David can design, fabricate and put it together while helping you learn how to do it yourself.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey and crew take everyone to one of the most amazing drag racing events in the country, the "Night Under Fire" in Norwalk, Ohio.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a well-worn '59 Chevy Apache pickup and shows how to approach a project, whether you are keeping it original or planning on modifying it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey goes out on the rails to take a look at the restoration of the 576 Steam Locomotive.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Thiokol Swamp Spryte is back in the shop for some much-needed restoration, and replacing the aluminum skin so she will float again; Stacey rolls in the Lil' Red Wagon for some new suspension and 50 years of Skyjacker history.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the Joe Dirt side of things and how an old, beat up Daytona made it cool to drive old, rusty junk! After that, he shows what it takes to make a high-end replica of a down-and-dirty car.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey demonstrates how to change a four-headlight classic Chevy truck into a two-headlight classic Chevy truck, just by changing some sheet metal. Is it as easy as it looks, or are there some hidden challenges waiting to bite you?

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey takes an old, beat-up '66 Mustang and puts some pep back in Its step. He shows you how to replace an old automatic transmission with a quick-shifting Tremec T5 5-speed, and how to lift an old cab or body off a frame without destroying it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: What do you get when you take a 4x4 diesel pickup, toss in over 2000hp and mix it with some serious bling? The definition of show and go! Stacey looks at a new twist on tool storage, and sets up a Jeep Gladiator for all your outdoor adventure needs!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Stunt Double is back in the shop for its much anticipated reveal and payoff! Inspired by the legendary FALL GUY truck, the Stunt Double is a ground up, frame off build of a classic square body Chevy truck that pays tribute to the stunt world.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in one of the most iconic show cars of the 1970's, the MOD ROD. After that, he shows how to properly disassemble the cab or body of your project, and pre-fit some new components at the same time.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 1970's Datsun 240Z! Follow along as he digs into the history of these legendary cars and shows some of the great ways to deal with the fragile parts and panels. The old Z cars are still out there. Now is the time to get one going!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 1970's Datsun 240Z! Follow along as he digs into the history of these legendary cars and shows some of the great ways to deal with the fragile parts and panels. The old Z cars are still out there. Now is the time to get one going!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls the 24Oz onto the lift to lay out the new brakes and suspension, adding a few race-inspired components to take the braking and handling to a different level; he showcases America's oldest motorsport, the tractor pull.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Get to know Dan and the crew through a day in the life at a Harley-Davidson dealership; the crew rides over to Lucky's Saloon for Bike Night, sharing a glimpse of the rich culture behind the Harley-Davidson brand.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The crew meets up to plan their first major Saturday event, a massive car and motorcycle show held at the dealership; Dan brings in powerhouse celebrity Dave Kindig from Kindig-It Design to check out the blockbuster turnout.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan and Ellen get an exclusive invitation to the Richard Petty Museum to meet the King himself; they take a tour of Petty's garage and childhood home; at the dealership, Rama sells a bike and invites a new customer out on a ride.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Bootlegger's Run, a motorcycle ride with stops at Hog Wild Saloon and Saints and Sinners Tavern; Dan and Ellen meet with the bar owners to get them on board.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The day of the big ride arrives; hundreds of bikes bring excitement to the dealership as the team manages the unexpected crowd; Dan's friends, moonshiners Tim Smith and Josh Owens, join in on the ride through Bootlegger Country.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan takes a break from the dealership to play in the Richard Petty Charity Golf Classic, but not everyone is a team player when things get heated on the course; back at the dealership, Dusty helps a loyal customer add a mod to his bike.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan looks back on the performance of the dealership over the past year. Did he put himself on the map, or does he still have some growing to do? At the dealership, Ellen steals Shannon away for a dramatic makeover that will certainly turn heads.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: A journey back in time to the very origins of drag racing; remastered archived footage with narration by Professor Jay Deez III bring these historical stories back to life again.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: A remarkable journey back into the wild '60s. Professor Jay Deez III takes us right into the glory days of drag racing with tales of the very first 200MPH dragsters, Christmas trees, and funny cars.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Professor Jay Deez III takes us on a journey back to the early days of Hollywood movies and their stories of hot rods and race cars.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: History comes alive with actual footage of remarkable machines and the big characters that risked it all to drive them into the history books.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Professor Jay Deez III takes us into the world of custom culture and the history of coachbuilders; people that introduced us to the Winfield Fade and even the Batmobile.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: The unbelievable story of how Big Willie Robinson and illegal street racing brought Los Angeles together. Racing with gangs, riots, cops, and mayors, this one has it all as told from the men who were there.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling with nomad Michael Ladden and his Drive the Globe expedition vehicle; heading to Utah to go dual sport riding; a look at the Glaciers to Geysers Trek: A Tale of Fire and Ice.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Oregon for the Bend Overland Expo and visits places like Crater Lake National Park; testing the Opus OP15 off-road trailer which sleeps four and has a full outdoor kitchen and solar power to live off-grid.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling to Whistler Canada to go mountain biking at North America's premiere mountain bike Park and going four wheeling; an inside look at project Toyota Tundra build for overlanding.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Hitting Alaska to go four wheeling, helicopter to a glacier to go dog sledding, then trying ziplining and taking a train ride; building a used 2017 Toyota 4Runner for overlanding, and showing why this SUV is so popular.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Montana to go off-roading; Ken Faught takes flight and lands on a backcountry grass strip near Glacier National Park; testing Forest River's Nobo 16.6 Beast Mode off-road trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team hits Yellowstone National Park to see some natural wonders; testing vintage trailer works XTR off-road trailer and introducing Greg Amendola, a legend in the world of vehicle electronics.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV team travels to Idaho to drive UTVs and ride the latest electric motorcycles; touring Pro Moto Billet where Wyatt Faught did a summer engineering internship; testing a Hiker Trailer built specifically for off-road.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team tackles extreme terrain in Utah before breaking down and heading back to California for some quick repairs; we return to Utah with a new crew and hit infamous places like Swingarm City, Cathedral Valley, Monument Valley and more.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew travels to Nelson Ghost Town outside of Las Vegas and shows you an inside look of a Ford Bronco Raptor build for overland; we also give a recap of our favorite moments during our 10,000-mile Alaska trip.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew tests a Field Van Mercedes Sprinter on a four-state trip through the West Coast; Ken Faught travels to Maui to drive UTVs and then heads to the desert to ride some electric dirt bikes and check out Tim Robel's expedition vehicle.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We head to Sand Hallow State Park in Utah to go rock crawling with the national champ; Rob and Christjen Johnson test electric motorcycles in upstate New York; we head to Cabo San Lucas to explore this special part of Mexico in UTVs.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We go overlanding with a $150,000 Jeep and then show you the maintenance tips for your off-road trailer; accessories for transporting your dirt bike, ATV or UTV in a truck, van or toy hauler trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Exploring the world of adventure motorcycles and showing the Editor's Choice for Must-Have Off-Road Products; a few surprises that will make you want to start planning an amazing off-road travel adventure.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: "My Classic Car" is a television program that captures America's love affair with the automobile; Dennis Gage takes viewers along for the ride and keeps it entertaining with his perspective and enthusiasm for all things automotive.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to the American Muscle Car Museum in Melbourne, Florida, and fires up the Alan Mann GT40.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to Arizona for the Tucson Classics Car Show.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Caring for classic automobiles.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to the Mississippi Gulf Coast for the "Cruisin' the Coast" event.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to the American Muscle Car Museum in Melbourne, Fla., and checks out a couple of trucks.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis heads to Idaho for the Emmett Show and Shine; radio upgrades for classic cars.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: From the rare and exotic to the extreme and wacky, Dennis Gage spotlights all things automotive, traveling the country to find the cars and events that spark America's love affair with the automobile.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Get to know Dan and the crew through a day in the life at a Harley-Davidson dealership; the crew rides over to Lucky's Saloon for Bike Night, sharing a glimpse of the rich culture behind the Harley-Davidson brand.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The crew meets up to plan their first major Saturday event, a massive car and motorcycle show held at the dealership; Dan brings in powerhouse celebrity Dave Kindig from Kindig-It Design to check out the blockbuster turnout.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan and Ellen get an exclusive invitation to the Richard Petty Museum to meet the King himself; they take a tour of Petty's garage and childhood home; at the dealership, Rama sells a bike and invites a new customer out on a ride.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Bootlegger's Run, a motorcycle ride with stops at Hog Wild Saloon and Saints and Sinners Tavern; Dan and Ellen meet with the bar owners to get them on board.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The day of the big ride arrives; hundreds of bikes bring excitement to the dealership as the team manages the unexpected crowd; Dan's friends, moonshiners Tim Smith and Josh Owens, join in on the ride through Bootlegger Country.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan takes a break from the dealership to play in the Richard Petty Charity Golf Classic, but not everyone is a team player when things get heated on the course; back at the dealership, Dusty helps a loyal customer add a mod to his bike.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan looks back on the performance of the dealership over the past year. Did he put himself on the map, or does he still have some growing to do? At the dealership, Ellen steals Shannon away for a dramatic makeover that will certainly turn heads.
